note:
I am a rural Texan interested in the intersection of technology and sociology, how technology can be used to learn about people and how people adapt to the technology around them. I also am fascinated by the field of web development, the growth of the fediverse, I love science in general, and my hobbies are knitting and crocheting.

Ich spreche ein bisschen Deutsch. Manchmal Folge ich deutsche Leute weil ich m√∂chte mehr Deutsch lernen. Sehen Leben auf Deutschland freut mich.

I am a caregiver in East Texas living a rather isolated life, so for now the fediverse is my window to humanity. If you want someone to chat with, feel free to reach out to me because I do enjoy spontaneous conversations. I love technology and making things by hand. I care deeply about humanity and the environment. I especially love learning about different cultures and cuisines, so I tend to follow accounts from all over the world that I come across just so I can learn more about people everywhere.
